recipies.name: Peppermint Crisp
recipies.description: The desert peppermint crisp is a delightful confection that combines the invigorating essence of peppermint with a crisp, chocolatey texture. Each bite delivers a refreshing burst of mint, perfectly balanced by a layer of smooth, rich chocolate that melts in your mouth. Often featuring a delightful crunch from sugar crystals or a light wafer base, this treat is both indulgent and refreshing, making it a perfect after-dinner delight or a midday pick-me-up. Its vibrant green hue adds a visual appeal, evoking the coolness of a minty breeze amidst a warm desert landscape. Enjoy it as a sweet escape into a world of flavor!
ingredients: 2 x 360g cans of dolce de leche or Nestle caramel treat
4 x 49g Nestle Peppermint Crisp choclates or any mint flavoured chocolates
2 x 200g Tennis buscuits or any coconut biscuits
